domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

text: @EricTrump At the rate folks are dying, due to your fathers failed respose to COVID-19 (128,000 so far), I'm sure there will be plenty of job openings. Don't you worry. You'll find out soon enough what it's like to worry about money. Investigations are coming when Daddy loses. Start packing
